title: Manjula Antique Gold Emerald Pendant Necklace - An Elegant Addition to Your Haaram Collection
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ) accents. The gold has a subtle antique finish
adding depth and character to the piece.
features: This necklace features a delicate flower motif chain, leading to a stunning floral pendant. The central emerald cabochon is surrounded by intricately set CZs in a traditional Hyderabadi Kundan setting. The pendant is adorned with spherical gold beads. The design incorporates elements reminiscent of traditional temple jewelry but with a lighter, more modern aesthetic. Fine filigree work is present throughout the pendant.
colors: and Sparkling White (CZ). The antique gold enhances the warmth of the green emerald
while the CZs provide a contrasting brilliance.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. Equally suitable for a sophisticated evening event or adding a touch of traditional elegance to a contemporary outfit. Ideal for events like Seemantham or Half-Saree functions.
description: This necklace is a testament to the skilled craftsmanship of Hyderabad's artisans. The antique finish provides a timeless appeal, while the combination of emerald and CZ offers a captivating sparkle. Its blend of tradition and modernity makes it a versatile piece, allowing it to be worn on various occasions. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability. Owning this piece means owning a part of Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage.
